meanings.sent1: The small dog would yap loudly at passing cars.
meanings.sent2: The neighbor's dog likes to yap at night.
meanings.sent3: The little dog's constant yap annoyed the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The dog's yap cut through the silence of the night.
meanings.sent5: The yap of the dog echoed in the empty street.

meanings.sent1: The yap of the small dog startled the cat.
meanings.sent2: I heard a high-pitched yap coming from the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The sudden yap made everyone jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The yap of the toy robot filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The yap of the puppy was music to my ears.

meanings.sent1: The group of friends would yap about their favorite movies.
meanings.sent2: She would yap on the phone for hours.
meanings.sent3: Stop yapping and let's get to work!
meanings.sent4: The students would yap during the entire class.
meanings.sent5: Her constant yap about the weather bored everyone around her.
